data.name: Puzzle Quest 3 - Resource Pack
data.detailed_description:
Acquire a variety of random relics to evolve weapons and gear to the next rarity! Upgrade your gear to Rare, Epic, and Legendary when ready to ascend with an assortment of relics provided to help sharpen your tools for every quest you tackle!

The Resource Pack Includes:

  • 10 Tier I Relics
  • 5 Tier II Relics
  • 1 Tier III Relics

Please note:
The contents of this DLC bundle are not tradeable or refundable.

data.short_description: Acquire a variety of random relics to evolve weapons and gear to the next rarity in Puzzle Quest 3!
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or Higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 5000 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: On Board
